tool_description: API pour récupérer des expressions calédoniennes, ainsi que des médias.
name: Kalolo
title: Kalolo

api_list.name: Expression au hasard
api_list.description: Une expression au hasard, par exemple pour faire l'expression du jour
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kalolo.p.rapidapi.com/expressions/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kalolo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://kalolo.p.rapidapi.com/expressions/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kalolo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
